QuestData.Title: Who Needs Cauldrons?
QuestData.Description: Have you seen the condition of Felstone Field? The Alliance forces at Andorhal have taken the area, and they're using it to... to... to grow CROPS!$b$bI almost liked it better when the Scourge held the area. At least they had the sense to put a giant plague cauldron in the middle of the field.$b$bWe're going to take that farm back from these humans, $n. Take these drums and place them at key locations around the field. I'll be waiting here at the Bulwark.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place Dithers' Plague Drums near the Windmill, the Grain Silos, the Ranch House, and the Barn at Felstone Field.
QuestData.CompletionText: I see you're still carrying some of those drums with you, $n. Don't return until they've all been placed.
QuestData.RewardText: <Dithers practically glimmers with excitement.>$b$bThe drums are placed? In their positions?$b$bVery well then, I will give the word to the High Executor. When the time is ready, he will be the one to press the ignition switch.
